Package org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file.impl

Class Summary
AbstractFileTaskService Provides an abstract base implementation of a file task service.
BaseFileTask Base implementation for (all) file tasks.
BaseFileTaskBroker Implements the file task service as a "broker" for other file task services.
BaseFileTaskSpec Provides a base implementation for (all) file task specifications.
FileLocationUserType To change this template use File | Settings | File Templates.
PersistedFileSet Provides a base implementation for (all) file sets
